lead_paragraph: Over the years, Saturday Night Live (a.k.a. SNL) has made a groundbreaking contribution to the American comedic tradition and to pop culture in general. Here, we take an inside look at the show's inimitable ability to both reflect and impact American news, history and culture. We observe the creative journey of the show from its initial pilot to becoming a revered comedic institution.
